front.title: Requirements for a Protocol between Media Gateway Controller and Media Gateway (Reference Point 'N')

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft contains an update of ETSI-TIPHON's workon requirements for a protocol at the reference point N (in TIPHONparlance) of the TIPHON reference configuration. Reference point Ndesignates the information flows required for control of a MediaGateway in a decomposed Gateway [0].This Internet-Draft supercedes the one submitted in November 1998and represents consensus of working group 2 in TIPHON.ETSI-TIPHON is working on standards to connect VoIP (Voice over IP)networks and phone networks.
